html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-11612023-11-24FIN
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2018-2023)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MOTOR VEHICLE EXPENSES AND BENEFITS 2018-2023) in order to ensure that the capital cost ceilings, interest expense limit, leasing limit, tax-exemption per-kilometer allowance limit reflect the underlying costs related to acquiring, financing or operating an automobile.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0246 Publication Date: 2023-12-06
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Motor Vehicle Expenses and Benefits 2018-2023)
precis: Regulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (MOTOR VEHICLE EXPENSES AND BENEFITS 2018-2023) in order to ensure that the capital cost ceilings, interest expense limit, leasing limit, tax-exemption per-kilometer allowance limit reflect the underlying costs related to acquiring, financing or operating an automobile.
